thread.title: Marco Belinelli's tricky game-winning shot attempt was a half second too late
thread.title_full: Marco Belinelli's tricky game-winning shot attempt was a half second too late

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Marco Belinelli's tricky game-winning shot attempt was a half second too late
text:
So close!
Marco Belinelli almost had the greatest regular season buzzer-beater we had ever seen. With 0.5 seconds left on the clock, Belinelli tried to bounce it off the back of Marcus Morris and then go up with the shot. He made it, it was just too late. Straight out of a Harlem Globetrotters game.
In reality there was probably never enough time to pull this off but it was a beautiful attempt and we appreciate it.
